snippet.title: You, Calligrapher - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Early Access is live!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1593700/
Applab: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3964171543647365/
《You, Calligrapher》is a VR Calligraphy simulator, in which you can write and draw in ink-painting style.

What's in it?

- A realistic, authentic ink brush physics simulation.
- Over 30 levels of challenges, containng words and phrases.
- A recorded example recorded from Calligraphy master for each word, allwoing you to learn to write like a master.
- Customizable colours that can be mixed by the motion of your dips.
- Saves and seal your works to share online.
- More will be added in the future.

《You, Calligrapher》it compatible with Valve Index, Oculus, HTC and WMR devices.

Check the game out:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1593700/
